description: Smallest number with exactly n nonprime divisors.
comments: a(n)<=2^n; see A057838 for the indices n where a(n)=2^n.
links: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..4438
mathematica: a = Table[0, {100} ]; Do[ c = Count[ PrimeQ[ Divisors[ n ] ], False]; If[ c < 101 && a[[ c ]] == 0, a[[ c ]] = n], {n, 2, 10077696} ];
prog: (PARI) sme(n) = {k = 1; while (sumdiv(k, d, ! isprime(d)) != n, k++); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Dec 13 2013(Haskell)a055079 n = head [x | x <- [1..], a033273 x == n]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 16 2013
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jun 13 2000
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 20 2000
